details.access_and_opening_times:
Opening hours

All telephone enquiries:

Monday to Friday, 07:30 to 14:30

Consular section - public counter:

By appointment only. Consular appointments can be booked for the relevant services on the following days:

  • Alexander Pallis Street (south) - Tuesday, 09:00 to 13:00
  • Mehmet Akif Street (north) - Wednesday, 09:30 to 12:30

British nationals who need emergency assistance need to contact the High Commission (Tel: +357 22861100, Option 2) and a member of staff will deal with them. Out of Consular section working hours (0730-1445) calls will be dealt with by London and if urgent consular assistance is deemed necessary the call will be escalated to post.

Public holidays in 2016

  • Friday 1 January (All offices)
  • Wednesday 6 January (Alexander Pallis Street)
  • Monday 14 March (Alexander Pallis Street)
  • Friday 25 March (All offices)
  • Monday 28 March (All offices)
  • Friday 29 April (All offices)
  • Monday 2 May (All offices)
  • Monday 30 May (All offices)
  • Monday 20 June (Alexander Pallis Street)
  • Monday 4 July (Mehmet Akif Street)
  • Tuesday 5 July (Mehmet Akif Street)
  • Wednesday 6 July (Mehmet Akif Street)
  • Monday 15 August (Alexander Pallis Street)
  • Monday 29 August (All offices)
  • Monday 12 September (Mehmet Akif Street)
  • Tuesday 13 September (Mehmet Akif Street)
  • Friday 28 October (Alexander Pallis Street)
  • Monday 26 December (All offices)
  • Tuesday 27 December (All offices)

Directions

See our map for directions to our offices
